description.narrative: Eden and Radikal Ungdom?s second pilot-project aims at developing our joint capacity to develop and implement youth-led and youth-targeted SDG projects. Building on the lessons learned from the first pilot-project in December 2019, both organisations realised that we needed to develop a set of skills and know-how before we launched a full-scale SDG partnership. This project focuses on educating SDG-Ambassadors using a Training of Trainers format, where these volunteers will develop communication and project-managing skills making them capable of conceptualise a strategy for a youth-for-youth SDG project in Morocco managed by the SDG-ambassadors from EDEN and Radikal Ungdom. The project will consist of two activities pursuant with aforementioned goals: (a) one summer-camp with the goal of training SDG-ambassadors and (b) a follow-up activity for RU, EDEN and the SDG Ambassadors with the goal of mapping potential areas of managing and implementing a joint SDG partnership-project in Morocco.
